update MSGFILE
MSGFILE_SUBSYS = #{msgfileSubsys,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MSGFILE_FEPNAME = #{msgfileFepname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSGFILE_SEVERITY = #{msgfileSeverity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MSGFILE_RETAIN = #{msgfileRetain,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

MSGFILE_WARNING = #{msgfileWarning,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
MSGFILE_EXTERNAL = #{msgfileExternal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MSGFILE_ATM = #{msgfileAtm,jdbcType=CHAR},
MSGFILE_UATMP = #{msgfileUatmp,jdbcType=CHAR},
MSGFILE_T24 = #{msgfileT24,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSGFILE_CREDIT = #{msgfileCredit,jdbcType=CHAR},
MSGFILE_SHORTMSG = #{msgfileShortmsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSGFILE_MSGDSCPT = #{msgfileMsgdscpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MSGFILE_RESPONSIBLE = #{msgfileResponsible,jdbcType=CLOB},
where MSGFILE_CHANNEL = #{msgfileChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER} and MSGFILE_ERRORCODE = #{msgfileErrorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
